item.title: ‘He bit my ear till it bled’: Survivor recalls horror at picnic with rape accused Monojit Mishra; stayed at home for weeksIn 2023, a college fresher was brutally assaulted by a senior, Monojit Mishra, during a picnic in Budge Budge. The victim endured a harrowing 40-minute ordeal, including physical violence and threats. Despite initial plans to report the crime, she was silenced by threats against her family from Monojit's gang.
item.description: ‘He bit my ear till it bled’: Survivor recalls horror at picnic with rape accused Monojit Mishra; stayed at home for weeksIn 2023, a college fresher was brutally assaulted by a senior, Monojit Mishra, during a picnic in Budge Budge. The victim endured a harrowing 40-minute ordeal, including physical violence and threats. Despite initial plans to report the crime, she was silenced by threats against her family from Monojit's gang.

item.title: International flyer footfall at Kolkata airport back to normal after conflict blipKolkata airport experienced a sharp decline in international passenger traffic due to airspace closures in the Middle East following Iranian missile strikes. The disruption, lasting from June 23-26, saw a significant drop in flyers and flight operations. However, with ceasefire talks and the subsequent lifting of restrictions, flight schedules have normalized.
item.description: International flyer footfall at Kolkata airport back to normal after conflict blipKolkata airport experienced a sharp decline in international passenger traffic due to airspace closures in the Middle East following Iranian missile strikes. The disruption, lasting from June 23-26, saw a significant drop in flyers and flight operations. However, with ceasefire talks and the subsequent lifting of restrictions, flight schedules have normalized.
